content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
---------------------------------
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Used to process iron ore with coal into additional iron plates.
• Entity: Furnace located at (5.0, 5.0).

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Used to convert copper ore (harvested from nearby patches) and coal into copper plates.
• Entity: Furnace located at (-27.0, -60.0).

ERROR TIPS
---------------------------------
• API Parameter Errors:
  – When calling get_entities(), use only supported argument types. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional parameters.
  
• Handling Null Returns:
  – Always check that entity retrieval calls do not return None before iterating over the results. Use a fallback (such as an empty list) when no entities are found.
  
• Lab Crafting and Placement Issues:
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients for lab crafting (such as sufficient iron-plates for iron-gear-wheel production, copper-plates for copper-cable, and electronic-circuit components) are available before attempting to craft a lab.
  – Verify that a lab is present in the inventory prior to placement to avoid placement errors.
